remarks: Lemma for 3OA (weak) orthoarguesian law.  (Contributed by NM, 19-Oct-1999.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
3oa.1 $e |- A e. CH $.
3oa.2 $e |- B e. CH $.
3oa.3 $e |- C e. CH $.
3oa.4 $e |- R = ( ( _|_ ` B ) i^i ( B vH A ) ) $.
3oa.5 $e |- S = ( ( _|_ ` C ) i^i ( C vH A ) ) $.
3oalem5 $p |- ( ( B +H R ) i^i ( C +H S ) ) = ( ( B vH R ) i^i ( C vH S ) ) $.
